New Records: LeBron James achieved his fourth consecutive triple-double
Key Match Events: The Los Angeles Lakers won 120-115 against the San Antonio Spurs
LeBron James had 15 points, 16 rebounds and 12 assists in the game
Pre-Game Insights: LeBron James emphasized his open-door policy and the importance of passing the torch to younger players
He mentioned that his role in the offense has diminished with father time but he can still take over a game when he has to
Post-Match Reflections: LeBron James complimented the Spurs for hanging around as long as they did
He credited his teammates for being good shooters and allowing him to achieve his fourth consecutive triple-double
Miscellaneous Highlights: LeBron James took time to spend a few minutes with Spurs rookie Stephon Castle, discussing the next steps for reads that Castle makes
Castle was excited to share a few moments with James and appreciated his advice
Others: The Los Angeles Lakers have won four consecutive games
LeBron James has led the Lakers to four consecutive wins
